title: League of Legends Board
body: I reached level 6 on my account yesterday and level 7 today. Despite all that, I am unable to interact with others in the league of legends board. It keeps saying that I have to be a certain level to perform certain actions or post a discussion. Is this a bug? Or is it referring to a different kind of "level"?

replies.body: It can take a bit for your account to sync up to the boards, but you are showing as level 7 now.  Just keep in mind that some specific areas might require a higher level!  Everything looks good now!
